Notes.Text:
This update for php7 fixes the following issues:
	  
Security issues fixed:	  

- CVE-2019-11039: Fixed a heap-buffer-overflow on php_jpg_get16 (bsc#1138173).
- CVE-2019-11040: Fixed an out-of-bounds read due to an integer overflow in 
  iconv.c:_php_iconv_mime_decode() (bsc#1138172).
    
Other issue addressed: 
 
- Enable php7 testsuite (bsc#1119396
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Function iconv_mime_decode_headers() in PHP versions 7.1.x below 7.1.30, 7.2.x below 7.2.19 and 7.3.x below 7.3.6 may perform out-of-buffer read due to integer overflow when parsing MIME headers. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.

Vulnerabilities.Description: When PHP EXIF extension is parsing EXIF information from an image, e.g. via exif_read_data() function, in PHP versions 7.1.x below 7.1.30, 7.2.x below 7.2.19 and 7.3.x below 7.3.6 it is possible to supply it with data what will cause it to read past the allocated buffer. This may lead to information disclosure or crash.
